name: Pivotal (Billy Myers)
description:
This game was created for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3.

Pivotal is a small game about turning the world around to move your guy. Dodge obstacles and try to get the highest times! The less turns you make and the less impacts you make, the better your score! This is a small sampler of the game that I was able to create in a week, and I plan on adding more content as time goes on. Let me know how you feel!

Controls

Pivotal supports using gamepads. All gamepad inputs are assuming you're using an Xbox controller, but PS4 controllers should work too.

Left arrow, Q, J (LB, D-pad Left) - Turn Left (counterclockwise)

Right arrow, E, L (RB, D-pad Right) - Turn Right (clockwise)

Down arrow, W, K (A, D-pad Down) - Turn Around (180° turn)

Menu navigation

Use the turning keys to navigate left and right through the levels, and the Enter key (or A) to confirm a selection.
